item.title: The 196 Black Friday deals you can still get
item.description: Black Friday is technically a thing of the past, but many of the best deals we told you about yesterday — including deep discounts on the AirPods Pro 3, the Pixel Watch 4, and the latest Kindle Paperwhite — are still kicking for now. In some cases, gadgets are out of stock at certain stores, […]

item.title: MIT Report Claims 11.7% of U.S. Labor Can Be Replaced with Existing AI
item.description: The report notes that it has some limitations, but says "policymakers cannot wait" to act on its findings.

item.title: Fiabilité des Tesla, « moteur Porsche » chez BYD et la Xpeng aux 1 600 km d’autonomie : les actus électriques immanquables – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Cette semaine, l'électromobilité continue de bousculer les standards : moteurs inédits, controverses autour de la fiabilité des Tesla, décisions industrielles fortes chez Renault, ou encore inquiétudes pour l'avenir du vélo cargo en ville. Voici les sujets qui ont fait réagir et que vous ne pouvez pas manquer !

item.title: The latest Nest Learning Thermostat is $70 off for Black Friday

It’s sleek, looks gorgeous on my wall, is easy to use (and install), and most importantly, […]

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy bundle for the Switch is still 20 percent off
item.description: Nintendo launched its $69.99 Super Mario Galaxy double pack for the Switch (complete with a free Switch 2 update) in October, but you can get the cartridge containing both games for $54.99 ($15 off) — the lowest price yet — at Woot. To see the discount, you have to select “New – USA Version” from […]

item.title: New York state law takes aim at personalized pricing
item.description: Businesses that use personalized pricing are now required to tell customers, “This price was set by an algorithm using your personal data."

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs téléviseurs 65 pouces 4K (Oled, QLED ou Full LED) en 2025 ?
